committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain land in the State of South Dakota to the Terry Peak Ski Area.
short_title: Terry Peak Land Transfer Act of 1999

summary.text: Terry Peak Land Conveyance Act of 1999 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain Black Hills National Forest land in South Dakota to the Terry Peak Ski Area.

titles.title: Terry Peak Land Conveyance Act of 1999
Terry Peak Land Transfer Act of 1999
A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain land in the State of South Dakota to the Terry Peak Ski Area.
